Stay in the loop

Join the Iowa CYP email list

Be first to know when camp registration opens, when adventure kits ship, and when partner events pop up near you.

What you can expect

Monthly roundups with quick registration reminders, statewide resource drops, and a peek at new programming—plus urgent alerts when spots are limited.

Prefer text or phone?

Call us at 515-252-4050 and we’ll plug you into the notification style that works best for your family.

Email preferences

About Iowa CYP

Fostering community, resilience, and positive development among Iowa's military-connected children and families.
